description: cream colored carton with tan stripes; wooden box with inscription on inside and outside of lid; wrapped in tissue; paper around scroll inside of tie; fabric is yellow; rollers are white porcelain with blue detail; image of a waterfall on the left with text on the right, building LL
inscription:
飛流直下動乾坤　山谷鳴兮草木翻　萬古以前蒼茫往　千年之後復歸元　天河忽現神通力　巗石無非鬼造痕　若使詩仙來到此　慨應擬關定驚魂
{?}
(The flying stream flows straight down,
shaking Heaven and Earth;
Mountains and valleys cry out, Ah!
plants and trees all tremble.
Before ten thousand years ago,
from chaos it issued forth,
And now, thousands of ages afterward,
it returns to the Origin!
The Heavenly River suddenly appears,
gods manifest their power;
The cliffs and rocks here cannot be other
than marks of demons\' labors!
If we could get the Poetry Immortal
to come and visit here,
Moved, he\'d try to stem the flow
and calm our startled spirits!)
[Jonathan Chaves]
title: Waterfall
